{{TOC|right}}

A structure [[Tag (Java Edition)|tag]] is a group of [[structure]]s. Structure tags are used to control which structures are targeted by various locating gameplay features, such as [[explorer maps]] and [[eye of ender]]. They can also be used when testing for structure arguments in commands with {{cd|#{{ph|resource location}}}}, which succeeds if the structure matches any of the structures specified in the tag.

== List of tags ==
=== cats_spawn_as_black ===
[[Cat]]s naturally spawn in these structures as the all-black variety. This tag is referenced in the {{cd|all_black}} cat variant [[Mob variant definitions#Spawn condition|spawn condition]].

{{tag_list|cats_spawn_as_black|type=structure
|swamp_hut
}}
=== cats_spawn_in ===
[[Cat]]s naturally spawn in these structures.

{{tag_list|cats_spawn_in|type=structure
|swamp_hut
}}
